about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS PROGRAM
Cursor Engine allows you to use any gif or image as a cursor on your Windows desktop. Customize every type of cursor to fit your exact idea! Cursor Engine will automatically convert the image of your choice into a cursor format and set it as your custom mouse cursor. Three clicks is all it takes to be the most stylish computer owner around!

FEATURES
  • An extensive list of mouse cursor-types can be changed, including: Arrow, Hand, I-Beam, App Starting, Wait, No, Size All, and much more!
  • Change your mouse cursor to any .gif or .png file.
  • Supported formats: gif, png, ani, cur.
  • A one-stop shop for viewing all your cursors.
  • Direct integration with GIPHY and Flickr, so you can select from millions of different animated cursors.
